name: guilds_of_ravnica_megapack
description: HUGE Guilds of Ravnica-inspired package: Surveil (Dimir), Jump-Start (Izzet), Mentor (Boros), Undergrowth (Golgari), Convoke (Selesnya), plus guild-flavored tokens, auras, equipment, and land patterns. Designed for procedural generation via adlibs.

Instant: Draw a card, then {SURVEIL_X}.
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. Then {SURVEIL_X}.
Target creature gets -{NUM_MED}/-{NUM_MED} {TEMP_DURATION}. {SURVEIL_X}.
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. {SURVEIL_X}.
Exile target card from a graveyard. {SURVEIL_X}.
Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. {SURVEIL_X}.
Target creature can't be blocked this turn. {SURVEIL_X}.
Jump-start. {JUMP_START_HINT}
Target creature gets +{NUM_SMALL}/+0 and gains prowess {TEMP_DURATION}. Jump-start. {JUMP_START_HINT}
Deal {NUM_SMALL} damage to any target. Jump-start. {JUMP_START_HINT}
Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy. Jump-start. {JUMP_START_HINT}
Draw two cards, then discard a card. Jump-start. {JUMP_START_HINT}
Tap up to two target creatures. {SURVEIL_X}.
Creatures you control gain hexproof {TEMP_DURATION}.
Deal {NUM_SMALL} damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.
Target creature gains flying {TEMP_DURATION}. Draw a card.
Exile target card from a graveyard. Create a 1/1 black Insect creature token.
Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample {TEMP_DURATION}.
Counter target activated or triggered ability.
Sorcery: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. Then {SURVEIL_X}.
Mill {NUM_MED}. Then {SURVEIL_X}.
Draw two cards. Then {SURVEIL_X}.
Destroy target tapped creature. {SURVEIL_X}.
Search your library for a card, then shuffle. Put that card on top. {SURVEIL_X}.
Create two 1/1 blue Elemental creature tokens with "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target." Jump-start. {JUMP_START_HINT}
Scry 2, then draw two cards. Jump-start. {JUMP_START_HINT}
Deal {NUM_MED} damage to target creature or planeswalker. Jump-start. {JUMP_START_HINT}
Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile this spell. Jump-start. {JUMP_START_HINT}
Create two 1/1 creature tokens. {SURVEIL_X}.
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
Return up to one target creature card and up to one target land card from your graveyard to your hand.
Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.
Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Create a 1/1 creature token.
Artifact: {ACTIVATED_COST}: Draw a card. Activate only as a sorcery.

Artifact: {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast multicolored spells.

TRIGGER_INTRO: Whenever a creature you control dies,
At the beginning of your upkeep,
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell,
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control,
JUMP_START_HINT: (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)
MENTOR_HINT: (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
CONVOKE_HINT: (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
UNDERGROWTH_HINT: (Undergrowth — Do X where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.)
GATE_LANDLINE: {T}: Add one mana of either of {GUILD_COLORS}.
{THIS} is a Gate in addition to its other types.
DISCARD_COST: Discard an instant or sorcery card:
